div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1095 Anapa (anc. Gorgippia), Krasnodar (47) Territory, RSFSR, 1882 Burial: c. 275-225 B.C. Contents: 394 AE. Pot hoard Panticapaeum: (as BMC 23 [2], 28-29 and 32-33 [350, some overstrikes and variants]) Disposition: Leningrad 352 OAK 1882-8 (publ. 1891), p. xix Pakhomov III, 692 â€ Prushevskaia, TONGE 1945, pp. 16-25 Noe erroneously locates Anapa in the Crimea
